name: Charlie Sheen Saves The Galaxy 2: Electric Boogaloo
name_original: Charlie Sheen Saves The Galaxy 2: Electric Boogaloo
description:
"The Galaxy is in peril as the Galactic Tiger Overlord Kaa'Nu begins a reign of terror in the stars. Our hero, Charlie Sheen'Su,  is the only hope at dispelling the scourge with his mighty ability to make it rain. REHAB IS OVER.  IT'S TIME TO WIN THE GALAXY BACK, WINNERS! SHEEEEEEEN'AAAASUUU!"

Subscribe to Pixelelement Games for the best Unity Tutorials.
Song: Snuffyville - "The Brimstone Symphony"
